entry.title: [GRA][Web Hosting] - Multiple Databases maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 17, 07:00 UTC  -  Nov 27, 07:00 UTC

Oct 15, 00:43 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our databases offer in cluster eu013.

This may temporarily affect availability.
Start time: 17/11/2025 07:00 UTC
End time: 27/11/2025 15:00 UTC
Service impact: The duration of the unavailability of each database will range from one to five minutes.
Service improvement: As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our databases offer.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [GRA][Web Hosting] - Cluster100 - Filerz2178
entry.content:
Oct 23, 17:22 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Web Hosting on the Cluster100 - Filerz2178 has been resolved.

Start time : 23/10/2025 16:15 UTC
End time : 23/10/2025 17:05 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a software issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Oct 23, 16:57 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating an incident affecting our Web Hosting offering, which is causing temporary availability issue on the Cluster100 - Filerz2178.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 23/10/2025 16:15 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Filerz2178 is temporarily unreachable on Web Hosting Cluster100.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to access and use their websites hosted on Filerz2178.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident to fix it.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Customers Impact : Customers were temporarily unable to access and use their websites hosted on Cluster112.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Impacted Service(s) : Cluster112 is temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to access and use their websites hosted on Cluster112.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident to fix it.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
